documentation.title: How to create IBM Bluemix account?
documentation.content: First thing of all, you need to register/signin IBM Bluemix platformin order to use our platform. Once sign in, you can choose from three payment models that IBM bluemix offers. Start with a Lite account and upgrade when you’re ready. Pay for what you need or secure pricing with a subscription.

subs.title: What Are The Faculty And Student Special Offers
content: IBM is offering faculty and students the opportunity to access services/service levels which may not otherwise be available though the free, no time limit, public cloud Lite plan. Those who qualify for and apply an academic code to their IBM Cloud account are entitled to access the free service levels ($Free Plan) as defined in the Standard pricing plan for each service. A list of services and their details can be found here.

Faculty codes will set the users account type to Trial for up to one year (renewable) AND increase the memory allocation up to 8 GB and allow up to 40 services running concurrently. Student codes will set the users account type to Trial for up to six months (renewable) AND increase the memory allocation up to 2 GB and allow up to 10 services running concurrently.

documentation.title: How To Access IBM Personality Insights?

subs.title: What does IBM Personality Insights do
content: IBM personality predicts personality characteristics, needs and values through written text. It is capable of understanding your customers’ habits and preferences on an individual level, and at scale. It uses linguistic analytics to infer individuals' personality characteristics, including Big Five, Needs, and Values; it also looks at a users inclination to pursue different products, services, and activities, including shopping, music, movies, and more.

subs.title: Get Personality Insights On Bluemix Platform

documentation.title: Where to find your IBM Personality Insights Credentials?
How do we handle your credentials?

subs.title: Your credential is safe with us
content: We temporarily store your credentials in the session at server side for 30 minutes. Since each BAE instance is a standalone "server" inside individual container, your credentials will not be seen by any other person.

subs.title: In case of unusual behaviour of your account
content: In case you notice any unusual behaviour of your Personality Insights account, you can regenerate the credentials easily. Just login Bluemix, and locate your personality insights instance. In the Servicecredentials tab, you can manipulate all of your credentials.
